dcterms:creator: S. Zhang
E. Dinan
J. Urbanek
A. Szlam
D. Kiela
J. Weston
dcterms:description: Persona-Chat is a conversation dataset grounded on personas, where each participant is assigned with a persona profile serving as background knowledge. The dataset is used to generate responses based on the input context that includes persona texts.
dcterms:title: Persona-Chat

dcterms:creator: Y. Li
H. Su
X. Shen
W. Li
Z. Cao
S. Niu
dcterms:description: DailyDialog is a manually labelled multi-turn dialogue dataset containing conversations about daily life. It is used for training dialogue systems to generate responses in a chit-chat format.
dcterms:title: DailyDialog
